podling.name: Abdera
podling.description: An implementation of the Atom Syndication Format and Atom Publishing Protocol.

podling.name: Accumulo
podling.description: Accumulo is a distributed key/value store that provides expressive, cell-level access labels.

podling.name: ACE
podling.description: A software distribution framework based on OSGi that allows you to manage and distribute artifacts.

podling.name: ActiveMQ
podling.description: A robust and high performance Message Orientated Middleware provider which will be integrated into Apache Geronimo but also be usable from inside any JVM.

podling.name: Agila
podling.description: Extensible Business Process Management (BPM) engine core.
podling.resolution: Project activity transferred to another Incubator project - ODE.

podling.name: Airavata
podling.description: A software suite to compose, manage, execute, and monitor large scale applications and workflows on computational resources ranging from local clusters to national grids and computing clouds.

podling.name: Airflow
podling.description: Airflow is a workflow automation and scheduling system that can be used to author and manage data pipelines.

podling.name: Allura
podling.description: Forge software for the development of software projects, including source control systems, issue tracking, discussion, wiki, and other software project management tools.

podling.name: Alois
podling.description: ALOIS is a log collection and correlation software with reporting and alarming functionalities.

podling.name: AltRMI
podling.description: A transparent Remote Procedure Call bean.
podling.resolution: Development stalled and the project activity transferred to JRemoting

podling.name: Ambari
podling.description: Ambari is a monitoring, administration and lifecycle management project for Apache Hadoop clusters.

podling.name: Amber
podling.description: The Amber project will deliver a Java development framework mainly aimed to build OAuth-aware applications. Amber graduated with the name Apache Oltu

podling.name: Annotator
podling.description: Annotator provides annotation enabling code for browsers, servers, and humans.

podling.name: Any23
podling.description: Anything To Triples (any23) is a library, a web service and a command line tool that extracts structured data in RDF format from a variety of Web documents.

podling.name: Apex
podling.description: Apex is an enterprise grade native YARN big data-in-motion platform that unifies stream processing as well as batch processing.

podling.name: Apollo
podling.description: A robust implementation of the OASIS WS-ResourceFramework (WSRF) family of specifications

podling.name: AriaTosca
podling.description: ARIA TOSCA project offers an easily consumable Software Development Kit(SDK) and a Command Line Interface(CLI) to implement TOSCA(Topology and Orchestration Specification of Cloud Applications) based solutions.

podling.name: Aries
podling.description: The Aries project will deliver a set of pluggable Java components enabling an enterprise OSGi application programming model.

podling.name: AsterixDB
podling.description: Apache AsterixDB is a scalable big data management system (BDMS) that provides storage, management, and query capabilities for large collections of semi-structured data.

podling.name: Atlas
podling.description: Apache Atlas is a scalable and extensible set of core foundational governance services that enables enterprises to effectively and efficiently meet their compliance requirements within Hadoop and allows integration with the complete enterprise data ecosystem

podling.name: Aurora
podling.description: Aurora is a service scheduler used to schedule jobs onto Apache Mesos.

podling.name: AWF
podling.description: AWF is a non-blocking, asynchronous, event driven high performance web framework running on the JVM. (Note: originally known as Deft, renamed to AWF on 2012-02-15)

podling.name: Axion
podling.description: Relational database engine written in Java.

podling.name: BatchEE
podling.description: BatchEE projects aims to provide a JBatch implementation (aka JSR352) and a set of useful extensions for this specification.

podling.name: Bean Validation
podling.description: The Bean Validation project will create an implementation of Bean Validation as defined by the Java EE specifications.

podling.name: Beam
podling.description: Apache Beam is an open source, unified model and set of language-specific SDKs for defining and executing data processing workflows, and also data ingestion and integration flows, supporting Enterprise Integration Patterns (EIPs) and Domain Specific Languages (DSLs). Dataflow pipelines simplify the mechanics of large-scale batch and streaming data processing and can run on a number of runtimes like Apache Flink, Apache Spark, and Google Cloud Dataflow (a cloud service). Beam also brings DSL in different languages, allowing users to easily implement their data integration processes.

podling.name: Beehive
podling.description: Extensible Java application framework with an integrated metadata-driven programming model for web services, web applications, and resource access

podling.name: Bigtop
podling.description: Bigtop is a project for the development of packaging and tests of the Hadoop ecosystem.

podling.name: Bloodhound
podling.description: Bloodhound is a software development collaboration tool, including issue tracking, wiki and repository browsing.

podling.name: Blur
podling.description: Blur is a search platform capable of searching massive amounts of data in a cloud computing environment.

podling.name: Bluesky
podling.description: Distance learning collaboration tool

podling.name: Brooklyn
podling.description: Brooklyn is a framework for modelling, monitoring, and managing applications through autonomic blueprints.

podling.name: Buildr
podling.description: Buildr is a simple and intuitive build system for Java projects written in Ruby.

podling.name: Calcite
podling.description: Calcite is a highly customizable engine for parsing and planning queries on data in a wide variety of formats. It allows database-like access, and in particular a SQL interface and advanced query optimization, for data not residing in a traditional database. (Renamed from Optiq on 2014-09-30.)

podling.name: CarbonData
podling.description: Apache CarbonData is a new Apache Hadoop native file format for faster interactive query using advanced columnar storage, index, compression and encoding techniques to improve computing efficiency, in turn it will help speedup queries an order of magnitude faster over PetaBytes of data.

podling.name: Cassandra
podling.description: Cassandra

podling.name: Climate Model Diagnostic Analyzer
podling.description: CMDA provides web services for multi-aspect physics-based and phenomenon-oriented climate model performance evaluation and diagnosis through the comprehensive and synergistic use of multiple observational data, reanalysis data, and model outputs.

podling.name: Concerted
podling.description: Apache Concerted is a Do-It-Yourself toolkit for building in-memory data engines.

podling.name: Cordova
podling.description: Apache Cordova is a platform for building native mobile applications using HTML, CSS and JavaScript (formerly Phonegap). The project entered incubation as Callback, but decided to change its name to Cordova on 2011-11-28.

podling.name: Cayenne
podling.description: Robust Persistence

podling.name: Celix
podling.description: Celix is an OSGi like implementation in C with a distinct focus on interoperability between Java and C.

podling.name: Chemistry
podling.description: Chemistry

podling.name: Chukwa
podling.description: Chukwa is a log collection and analysis framework for Apache Hadoop clusters.

podling.name: Clerezza
podling.description: an OSGi-based modular application and set of components (bundles) for building RESTFul Semantic Web applications and services.

podling.name: Click
podling.description: Component based Java Web Framework

podling.name: CloudStack
podling.description: CloudStack is an IaaS (“Infrastracture as a Service”) cloud orchestration platform.

podling.name: CommonsRDF
podling.description: Commons RDF is a set of interfaces and classes for RDF 1.1 concepts and behaviours. The commons-rdf-api module defines interfaces and testing harness. The commons-rdf-simple module provides a basic reference implementation to exercise the test harness and clarify API contracts.

podling.name: Composer
podling.description: Embeddable IoC container

podling.name: Corinthia
podling.description: Corinthia is a toolkit/application for converting between and editing common office file formats, with an initial focus on word processing. It is designed to cater for multiple classes of platforms - desktop, web, and mobile - and relies heavily on web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for representing and manipulating documents. The toolkit is small, portable, and flexible, with minimal dependencies. The target audience is developers wishing to include office viewing, conversion, and editing functionality into their applications.

podling.name: CouchDB
podling.description: CouchDB

podling.name: Cotton
podling.description: Cotton is an Apache Mesos framework for running MySQL instances.

podling.name: Crunch
podling.description: Crunch is a Java library for writing, testing, and running pipelines of MapReduce jobs on Apache Hadoop.

podling.name: cTAKES
podling.description: cTAKES (clinical Text Analysis and Knowledge Extraction System) is an natural language processing tool for information extraction from electronic medical record clinical free-text.

podling.name: Curator
podling.description: Curator - ZooKeeper client wrapper and rich ZooKeeper framework

podling.name: CXF
podling.description: The CXF project will create a SOA services framework by merges the ObjectWeb Celtix project and the Codehaus XFire project.

podling.name: DataFu
podling.description: DataFu provides a collection of Hadoop MapReduce jobs and functions in higher level languages based on it to perform data analysis. It provides functions for common statistics tasks (e.g. quantiles, sampling), PageRank, stream sessionization, and set and bag operations. DataFu also provides Hadoop jobs for incremental data processing in MapReduce.

podling.name: Deltacloud
podling.description: Deltacloud, cloud API (REST) and abstraction framework

podling.name: DeltaSpike
podling.description: DeltaSpike is a collection of JSR-299 (CDI) Extensions for building applications on the Java SE and EE platforms.

podling.name: Depot
podling.description: Integrated tools for automating downloading, publishing and managing software artifacts, along with tools for manipulating their metadata.

podling.name: Derby
podling.description: Java relational database

podling.name: DeviceMap
podling.description: Apache DeviceMap is a data repository containing device information, images and other relevant information for all sorts of mobile devices, e.g. smartphones and tablets. While the focus is initially on that data, APIs will also be created to use and manage it.

podling.name: DirectMemory
podling.description: DirectMemory's main purpose is to to act as a second level cache able to store large amounts of data without filling up the Java heap and thus avoiding long garbage collection cycles.

podling.name: Directory
podling.description: Directory projects.

podling.name: DistributedLog
podling.description: DistributedLog is a high-performance replicated log service. It offers durability, replication and strong consistency, which provides a fundamental building block for building reliable distributed systems.

podling.name: Drill
podling.description: Drill is a distributed system for interactive analysis of large-scale datasets, inspired by Google's Dremel.

podling.name: Droids
podling.description: Droids aims to be an intelligent standalone robot framework that allows to create and extend existing droids (robots).

podling.name: Eagle
podling.description: Apache Eagle is an open source analytics solution for identifying security and performance issues instantly on big data platforms, e.g. Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark. It analyzes data activities, yarn applications, jmx metrics, and daemon logs etc., provides state-of-the-art alert engine to identify security breach, performance issues and shows insights.

podling.name: EasyAnt
podling.description: Easyant is a build system based on Apache Ant and Apache Ivy.

podling.name: Edgent
podling.description: Edgent is a stream processing programming model and lightweight runtime to execute analytics at devices on the edge or at the gateway.

podling.name: Empire-db
podling.description: Data persistence component.

podling.name: ESME
podling.description: Enterprise Social Messaging Experiment (ESME) is a secure and highly scalable microsharing and micromessaging platform that allows people to discover and meet one another and get controlled access to other sources of information, all in a business process context.

podling.name: Etch
podling.description: A cross-platform, language- and transport-independent framework for building and consuming network services.

podling.name: Falcon
podling.description: A data processing and management solution for Hadoop designed for data motion, coordination of data pipelines, lifecycle management, and data discovery.

podling.name: Felix
podling.description: Implementation of the OSGi R4 specification.

podling.name: Fineract
podling.description: Fineract is an open source system for core banking as a platform.

podling.name: Flex
podling.description: Application framework for building Flash-based applications.

podling.name: Flink
podling.description: Flink is an open source system for expressive, declarative, fast, and efficient data analysis. Stratosphere combines the scalability and programming flexibility of distributed MapReduce-like platforms with the efficiency, out-of-core execution, and query optimization capabilities found in parallel databases. Flink was originally known as Stratosphere when it entered the Incubator.

podling.name: Flume
podling.description: Flume is a distributed, reliable, and available system for efficiently collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of log data from many different sources to a centralized data store.

podling.name: Fluo
podling.description: Fluo is a distributed system for incrementally processing large data sets stored in Accumulo.

podling.name: FreeMarker
podling.description: FreeMarker is a template engine, i.e. a generic tool to generate text output based on templates. FreeMarker is implemented in Java as a class library for programmers.

podling.name: FtpServer
podling.description: A complete FTP Server based on Mina I/O system.

podling.name: Gearpump
podling.description: Gearpump is a reactive real-time streaming engine based on the micro-service Actor model.

podling.name: Geronimo
podling.description: J2EE Container

podling.name: Giraph
podling.description: Giraph is a large-scale, fault-tolerant, Bulk Synchronous Parallel (BSP)-based graph processing framework.

podling.name: Gora
podling.description: Gora is an ORM framework for column stores such as Apache HBase and Apache Cassandra with a specific focus on Hadoop.

podling.name: Gossip
podling.description: Gossip is an implementation of the Gossip Protocol.

podling.name: Graffito
podling.description: Portal oriented Content Management System

podling.name: Griffin
podling.description: Griffin is a open source Data Quality solution for distributed data systems at any scale in both streaming or batch data context

podling.name: Guacamole
podling.description: Guacamole is an enterprise-grade, protocol-agnostic, remote desktop gateway. Combined with cloud hosting, Guacamole provides an excellent alternative to traditional desktops. Guacamole aims to make cloud-hosted desktop access preferable to traditional, local access.

podling.name: Geode
podling.description: Geode is a data management platform that provides real-time, consistent access to data-intensive applications throughout widely distributed cloud architectures.

podling.name: Groovy
podling.description: Groovy is an object-oriented programming language for the Java platform. It is a language with features similar to those of Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, and Smalltalk.

podling.name: Hama
podling.description: Hama is a distributed computing framework based on BSP (Bulk Synchronous Parallel) computing techniques for massive scientific computations, e.g., matrix, graph and network algorithms.

podling.name: Harmony
podling.description: Compatible implementation of J2SE

podling.name: HAWQ
podling.description: HAWQ is an advanced enterprise SQL on Hadoop analytic engine built around a robust and high-performance massively-parallel processing (MPP) SQL framework evolved from Pivotal Greenplum Database.

podling.name: HORN
podling.description: HORN is a neuron-centric programming APIs and execution framework for large-scale deep learning, built on top of Apache Hama.

podling.name: HCatalog
podling.description: HCatalog is a table and storage management service for data created using Apache Hadoop.
podling.resolution: HCatalog became part of the Hive project

podling.name: Hadoop Development Tools (HDT)
podling.description: Eclipse based tools for developing applications on the Hadoop platform
podling.resolution: Retired at request of PPMC as the project failed to grow community.

podling.name: Helix
podling.description: Apache Helix is a generic cluster management framework used to build distributed systems and provides automatic partition management, fault tolerance and elasticity.

podling.name: Heraldry
podling.description: Identity for the rest of us.
podling.resolution: Project retired. Some activity moved to OpenID.net

podling.name: Hermes
podling.description: A robust implementation of the OASIS WS-Notification (WSN) family of specifications

podling.name: HISE
podling.description: HISE

podling.name: Hivemall
podling.description: Hivemall is a library for machine learning implemented as Hive UDFs/UDAFs/UDTFs.

podling.name: HTrace
podling.description: HTrace is a tracing framework intended for use with distributed systems written in java.

podling.name: httpd-CLI
podling.description: CLI integration project for httpd server

podling.name: iBATIS
podling.description: The iBATIS Data Mapper framework makes it easier to use a database with Java or .NET applications. iBATIS couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor.

podling.name: Ignite
podling.description: A unified In-Memory Data Fabric providing high-performance, distributed in-memory data management software layer between various data sources and user applications.

podling.name: Impala
podling.description: Impala is a high-performance C++ and Java SQL query engine for data stored in Apache Hadoop-based clusters.

podling.name: Imperius
podling.description: Rule-based Management Policy Engine
podling.resolution: Although the Apache Imperius project was successful in building an SPL implementation and had a successful release, there is not sufficient community energy to warrant continued development of Imperius at the Apache Software Foundation.

podling.name: iota
podling.description: Open source system that enables the orchestration of IoT devices.

podling.name: Isis
podling.description: The Isis project will be an extensible standards-based framework to rapidly develop and enterprise level deploy domain-driven (DDD) applications.

podling.name: Ivy
podling.description: A java based tool for tracking, resolving and managing project dependencies.

podling.name: Jackrabbit
podling.description: Content Repository API based on JSR 170

podling.name: JaxMe
podling.description: Implementation of JAXB, the specification for Java/XML binding

podling.name: jclouds
podling.description: A cloud agnostic library that enables developers to access a variety of supported cloud providers using one API

podling.name: JDO
podling.description: JDO2

podling.name: Jena
podling.description: Java framework for building Semantic Web applications.

podling.name: Johnzon
podling.description: Implementation of JSR-353 JavaTM API for JSON Processing (Renamed from Fleece)

podling.name: Joshua
podling.description: Joshua is a statistical machine translation toolkit

podling.name: JSPWiki
podling.description: Java-based wiki engine

podling.name: jUDDI
podling.description: Implementation of a Universal Description Discovery and Integration (UDDI) registry

podling.name: JuiCE
podling.description: OpenSSL based JCE provider. Project going into retired status after lack of community interest.

podling.name: Juneau
podling.description: Apache Juneau is a toolkit for marshalling POJOs to a wide variety of content types using a common framework, and for creating sophisticated self-documenting REST interfaces and microservices using VERY little code.

podling.name: Kabuki
podling.description: An AJAX toolkit

podling.name: Kafka
podling.description: Kafka is a distributed publish-subscribe system for processing large amounts of streaming data.

podling.name: Kalumet
podling.description: Kalumet a complete environment manager and deployer including J2EE environments (application servers, applications, etc), softwares, and resources.

podling.name: Kato
podling.description: Kato is a project to develop the Specification, Reference Implementation, and TCK for JSR 326: the JVM Post-mortem Diagnostics API.

podling.name: Kitty
podling.description: Kitty is a lightweight, production focused, Java-based application server performance diagnostic and management utility.

podling.name: Knox
podling.description: Knox Gateway is a system that provides a single point of secure access for Apache Hadoop clusters.

podling.name: Kudu
podling.description: Kudu is a distributed columnar storage engine built for the Apache Hadoop ecosystem.

podling.name: Kylin
podling.description: Kylin is a distributed and scalable OLAP engine built on Hadoop to support extremely large datasets.

podling.name: Lens
podling.description: Lens is a platform that enables multi-dimensional queries in a unified way over datasets stored in multiple warehouses. Lens integrates Apache Hive with other data warehouses by tiering them together to form logical data cubes.

podling.name: Lenya
podling.description: Content Management and publishing system based on Cocoon

podling.name: Libcloud
podling.description: libcloud is a standard client library for many popular cloud providers, written in python

podling.name: log4cxx
podling.description: Logging for C++. N.B. the code has re-entered the Incubator as log4cxx2.

podling.name: log4cxx2
podling.description: Logging for C++. N.B. This is a reboot of the Log4cxx podling which previously graduated.

podling.name: log4net
podling.description: Logging for .NET

podling.name: Log4php
podling.description: Logging for PHP.

podling.name: Lokahi
podling.description: The Lokahi project will create a management console for Apache HTTP Server and Apache Tomcat projects on a framework extensible to other ASF projects.
podling.resolution: Retired due to inactivity. Some talk of moving parts of the codebase to Tomcat.

podling.name: Lucene.NET
podling.description: Lucene.NET is a source code, class-per-class, API-per-API and algorithmatic port of the Java Lucene search engine to the C# and .NET platform utilizing Microsoft .NET Framework.

podling.name: Lucene4c
podling.description: Lucene for C.
podling.resolution: Progress stalled as developers ran out of free time and motivation.

podling.name: Lucy
podling.description: A loose port of the Lucene search engine library, written in C and targeted at dynamic language users.

podling.name: MADlib
podling.description: Big Data Machine Learning in SQL for Data Scientists.

podling.name: ManifoldCF
podling.description: Connectors for content repositories like Sharepoint, Documentum, etc.

podling.name: Marmotta
podling.description: An open implementation of a Linked Data Platform.

podling.name: MerlinDeveloper
podling.description: Merlin eclipse plugin merged with an existing eclipse plugin already at avalon.

podling.name: Mesos
podling.description: Mesos is a cluster manager that provides resource sharing and isolation across cluster applications.

podling.name: MetaModel
podling.description: MetaModel is a data access framework, providing a common interface for exploration and querying of different types of datastores.

podling.name: Metron
podling.description: Metron is a project dedicated to providing an extensible and scalable advanced network security analytics tool. It has strong foundations in the Apache Hadoop ecosystem.

podling.name: Milagro
podling.description: Distributed Cryptography; M-Pin protocol for Identity and Trust

podling.name: Mnemonic
podling.description: Mnemonic is a Java based non-volatile memory library for in-place structured data processing and computing.

podling.name: mod_ftp
podling.description: FTP protocol module for Apache httpd 2.x

podling.name: MRQL
podling.description: MRQL is a query processing and optimization system for large-scale, distributed data analysis, built on top of Apache Hadoop, Hama, Spark, and Flink.

podling.name: MRUnit
podling.description: MRUnit is a library to support unit testing of Hadoop MapReduce jobs.

podling.name: Muse
podling.description: A robust implementation of the OASIS WSDM, Management using Web Services (MuWS) specification

podling.name: MyFaces
podling.description: MyFaces is a framework for building Java Server application GUIs based on JavaServer Faces (certified implementation of JSR-127).

podling.name: Mynewt
podling.description: Mynewt is a real-time operating system for constrained embedded systems like wearables, lightbulbs, locks and doorbells. It works on a variety of 32-bit MCUs (microcontrollers), including ARM Cortex-M and MIPS architectures.

podling.name: Myriad
podling.description: Myriad enables co-existence of Apache Hadoop YARN and Apache Mesos together on the same cluster and allows dynamic resource allocations across both Hadoop and other applications running on the same physical data center infrastructure.

podling.name: NetBeans
podling.description: NetBeans is a development environment, tooling platform and application framework.

podling.name: NiFi
podling.description: NiFi is a dataflow system based on the concepts of flow-based programming.

podling.name: NMaven
podling.description: .NET integration for Maven. Failed to build active community.
podling.resolution: Efforts moved to NPanday. Other similar projects are NMaven @ Codeplex (http://www.codeplex.com/nmaven/) and Byldan @ Codeplex (http://www.codeplex.com/byldan/).

podling.name: NPanday
podling.description: NPanday allows projects using the .NET framework to be built with Apache Maven.

podling.name: Nutch
podling.description: Web search software.

podling.name: Nuvem
podling.description: Nuvem defines an open application programming interface for common cloud application services, allowing applications to be easily ported across the most popular cloud platforms. The podling was voted to become part of Tuscany in Nov 2012 but (as of Aug 2014) nothing has happened.

podling.name: Ode
podling.description: Orchestration Director Engine

podling.name: ODF Toolkit
podling.description: Java modules that allow programmatic creation, scanning and manipulation of OpenDocument Format (ISO/IEC 26300 == ODF) documents

podling.name: OFBiz
podling.description: The Open For Business Project (OFBiz) is an open source enterprise automation software project.

podling.name: OGNL
podling.description: Object-Graph Notation Language implementation in Java

podling.name: Olingo
podling.description: OData implementation in Java

podling.name: Olio
podling.description: Web 2.0 evaluation kit

podling.name: Omid
podling.description: Omid is a flexible, reliable, high performant and scalable ACID transactional framework that allows client applications to execute transactions on top of MVCC key/value-based NoSQL datastores (currently Apache HBase) providing Snapshot Isolation guarantees on the accessed data.

podling.name: Onami
podling.description: Apache Onami aims to create a community focused on the development and maintenance of a set of Google Guice extensions not provided out of the box by the library itself nor the Google developers team, such as integration with 3rd part frameworks or extra functionalities.

podling.name: OODT
podling.description: A grid middleware framework for science data processing, information integration, and retrieval.

podling.name: Oozie
podling.description: Server-based workflow scheduling and coordination system to manage data processing jobs for Apache Hadoop

podling.name: Open Climate Workbench
podling.description: A tool for scalable comparison of remote sensing observations to climate model outputs, regionally and globally.

podling.name: OpenAz
podling.description: Tools and libraries for developing Attribute-based Access Control (ABAC) Systems in a variety of languages.

podling.name: OpenEJB
podling.description: OpenEJB EJB Server and Container

podling.name: OpenJPA
podling.description: OpenJPA is an open source implementation of the Java Persistence API

podling.name: Openmeetings
podling.description: Openmeetings is a web conferencing solution.

podling.name: OpenNLP
podling.description: OpenNLP is a machine learning based toolkit for the processing of natural language text.

podling.name: OpenOffice.org
podling.description: OpenOffice.org is comprised of six personal productivity applications: a word processor (and its web-authoring component), spreadsheet, presentation graphics, drawing, equation editor, and database.

podling.name: OpenWebBeans
podling.description: JSR-299 Implementation

podling.name: OpenWhisk
podling.description: distributed Serverless computing platform

podling.name: Parquet
podling.description: Parquet is a columnar storage format for Hadoop.

podling.name: PDFBox
podling.description: PDF library (reading, text extraction, manipulation, viewer)

podling.name: Phoenix
podling.description: Phoenix is an open source SQL query engine for Apache HBase, a NoSQL data store. It is accessed as a JDBC driver and enables querying and managing HBase tables using SQL.

podling.name: PhotArk
podling.description: A Photo Gallery application, accessible via the web and written in Java

podling.name: Pig
podling.description: Pig is a platform for analyzing large datasets.

podling.name: Pirk
podling.description: Pirk is a framework for scalable Private Information Retrieval (PIR).

podling.name: Pivot
podling.description: A platform for building rich internet applications in Java.

podling.name: Pluto
podling.description: JSR 168 Reference Implementation

podling.name: Pony Mail
podling.description: Pony Mail is a mail-archiving, archive viewing, and interaction service, that can be integrated with many email platforms.

podling.name: PredictionIO
podling.description: PredictionIO is an open source Machine Learning Server built on top of state-of-the-art open source stack, that enables developers to manage and deploy production-ready predictive services for various kinds of machine learning tasks.

podling.name: Provisionr
podling.description: Provisionr provides a service to manage pools of virtual machines on multiple clouds.
podling.resolution: Failed to grow a community. Retired at request of PPMC.

podling.name: Quickstep
podling.description: Quickstep is a high-performance database engine.

podling.name: Qpid
podling.description: Qpid provides multiple language implementations of the Advanced Messaged Queuing Protocol (AMQP)

podling.name: Ranger
podling.description: The Ranger project is a framework to enable, monitor and manage comprehensive data security across the Hadoop platform.

podling.name: RAT
podling.description: Comprehension and auditing for distributions and source code
podling.resolution: Became part of new Apache Creadur TLP

podling.name: Ratis
podling.description: Ratis is a java implementation for RAFT consensus protocol

podling.name: Rave
podling.description: Rave is A WEb And SOcial Mashup Engine.

podling.name: RCF
podling.description: JSF Component Library.

podling.name: REEF
podling.description: REEF (Retainable Evaluator Execution Framework) is a scale-out computing fabric that eases the development of Big Data applications on top of resource managers such as Apache YARN and Mesos.

podling.name: Ripple
podling.description: Ripple is a browser based mobile phone emulator designed to aid in the development of HTML5 based mobile applications. Ripple is a cross platform and cross runtime testing/debugging tool. It currently supports such runtimes as Cordova, WebWorks aand the Mobile Web.

podling.name: River
podling.description: River : Jini technology

podling.name: RocketMQ
podling.description: RocketMQ is a fast, low latency, reliable, scalable, distributed, easy to use message-oriented middleware, especially for processing large amounts of streaming data.

podling.name: Roller
podling.description: Roller blog server

podling.name: Rya
podling.description: Rya (pronounced "ree-uh" /rēə/) is a cloud-based RDF triple store that supports SPARQL queries. Rya is a scalable RDF data management system built on top of Accumulo. Rya uses novel storage methods, indexing schemes, and query processing techniques that scale to billions of triples across multiple nodes. Rya provides fast and easy access to the data through SPARQL, a conventional query mechanism for RDF data.

podling.name: S2Graph
podling.description: S2Graph is a distributed and scalable OLTP graph database built on Apache HBase to support fast traversal of extremely large graphs.

podling.name: S4
podling.description: S4 (Simple Scalable Streaming System) is a general-purpose, distributed, scalable, partially fault-tolerant, pluggable platform that allows programmers to easily develop applications for processing continuous, unbounded streams of data.

podling.name: SAMOA
podling.description: SAMOA provides a collection of distributed streaming algorithms for the most common data mining and machine learning tasks such as classification, clustering, and regression, as well as programming abstractions to develop new algorithms that run on top of distributed stream processing engines (DSPEs). It features a pluggable architecture that allows it to run on several DSPEs such as Apache Storm, Apache S4, and Apache Samza.

podling.name: Samza
podling.description: Samza is a stream processing system for running continuous computation on infinite streams of data.

podling.name: Sanselan
podling.description: The Sanselan Project is a pure-java image library for reading and writing a variety of image formats.

podling.name: SensSoft
podling.description: SensSoft is a software tool usability testing platform

podling.name: Sentry
podling.description: Sentry is a highly modular system for providing fine grained role based authorization to both data and metadata stored on an Apache Hadoop cluster.

podling.name: ServiceMix
podling.description: The ServiceMix project will create an ESB and component suite based on the Java Business Interface (JBI) standard - JSR 208.

podling.name: Spark
podling.description: Spark is an open source system for fast and flexible large-scale data analysis. Spark provides a general purpose runtime that supports low-latency execution in several forms.

podling.name: Shindig
podling.description: The Shindig Project is an OpenSocial container.

podling.name: Shiro
podling.description: Security framework. (Initially known as JSecurity or Ki, renamed June 2009)

podling.name: Singa
podling.description: Singa is a distributed deep learning platform.

podling.name: Sirona
podling.description: Monitoring Solution.

podling.name: SIS
podling.description: The Spatial Information System (SIS) Project is a toolkit that spatial information system builders or users can leverage to build applications containing location context.

podling.name: Slider
podling.description: Slider is a collection of tools and technologies to package, deploy, and manage long running applications on Apache Hadoop YARN clusters.

podling.name: Sling
podling.description: Sling is a framework to develop content centric web applications based on the idea of modularizing the rendering of HTTP resources.

podling.name: SocialSite
podling.description: SocialSite is an OpenSocial-based headless social networking server and a set of OpenSocial Gadgets that make it easy to add social features to existing web sites. Server provides admin console for configuration, gadget approval and management. Gadgets can be combined to form complete UI for social networking with friending, group management and message support.

podling.name: Solr
podling.description: Full Text Search Server

podling.name: SpamAssassin
podling.description: Mail filter to identify spam.

podling.name: Spot
podling.description: Apache Spot is a platform for network telemetry built on an open data model and Apache Hadoop.

podling.name: Sqoop
podling.description: Sqoop is a tool designed for efficiently transferring bulk data between Apache Hadoop and structured datastores such as relational databases.

podling.name: Stanbol
podling.description: A modular software stack and reusable set of components for semantic content management

podling.name: stdcxx
podling.description: The Apache C++ Standard Library project is a complete implementation of the ISO/IEC 14882 C++ Standard Library.

podling.name: Stonehenge
podling.description: Stonehenge is a set of interoperability scenarios for Service Oriented Architecture and Web Services that demonstrate interoperability between multiple systems including Apache Axis2, WSF/PHP and Microsoft WCF. The code also demonstrates good practice for standards-based interoperability.
podling.resolution: "The Stonehenge project pretty much accomplished what it originally set out to do and then really didn't find a way to transition to something that is longer lasting and able to develop a community around it."

podling.name: Storm
podling.description: Storm is a distributed, fault-tolerant, and high-performance realtime computation system that provides strong guarantees on the processing of data.

podling.name: Stratos
podling.description: Stratos will be a polyglot PaaS framework, providing developers a cloud-based environment for developing, testing, and running scalable applications, and IT providers high utilization rates, automated resource management, and platform-wide insight including monitoring and billing.

podling.name: Streams
podling.description: Apache Streams is a lightweight server for ActivityStreams.

podling.name: Subversion
podling.description: Subversion is an open-source version control system, with a long and detailed list of features. (See http://subversion.apache.org/features.html)

podling.name: Synapse
podling.description: Web Services Mediation Framework

podling.name: Syncope
podling.description: An Open Source system for managing digital identities in enterprise environments, implemented in JEE technology

podling.name: SystemML
podling.description: SystemML provides declarative large-scale machine learning (ML) that aims at flexible specification of ML algorithms and automatic generation of hybrid runtime plans ranging from single node, in-memory computations, to distributed computations such as Apache Hadoop MapReduce and Apache Spark.

podling.name: Tajo
podling.description: Tajo is a distributed data warehouse system for Hadoop.

podling.name: Tapestry
podling.description: Alternative framework to JSP and Velocity scripting environments

podling.name: Tashi
podling.description: An infrastructure for cloud computing on big data.

podling.name: Tamaya
podling.description: Tamaya is a highly flexible configuration solution based on an modular, extensible and injectable key/value based design, which should provide a minimal but extendible modern and functional API leveraging SE, ME and EE environments.

podling.name: Taverna
podling.description: Taverna is a domain-independent suite of tools used to design and execute data-driven workflows.

podling.name: Tephra
podling.description: Tephra is a system for providing globally consistent transactions on top of Apache HBase and other storage engines.

podling.name: Tez
podling.description: Tez is an effort to develop a generic application framework which can be used to process arbitrarily complex data-processing tasks and also a re-usable set of data-processing primitives which can be used by other projects.

podling.name: Thrift
podling.description: Cross-language serialization and RPC framework.

podling.name: Tika
podling.description: Content analysis toolkit

podling.name: TinkerPop
podling.description: TinkerPop is a graph computing framework written in Java

podling.name: Tobago
podling.description: A JSF based framework for web-applications.

podling.name: Toree
podling.description: Toree provides applications with a mechanism to interactively and remotely access Apache Spark.

podling.name: Traffic Server
podling.description: A scalable and extensible HTTP proxy server and cache.

podling.name: Traffic Control
podling.description: Traffic Control allows you to build a large scale content delivery network using open source.

podling.name: Trafodion
podling.description: Trafodion is a webscale SQL-on-Hadoop solution enabling transactional or operational workloads on Hadoop.

podling.name: Trinidad
podling.description: JSF Component Library

podling.name: TripleSoup
podling.description: SPARQL endpoint for your webserver. Project entering retired status after failing to get traction.

podling.name: TSIK
podling.description: implementations of various W3C and OASIS specifications related to XML and Web services security
podling.resolution: Failed to gather community momentum. Cancelled at request of Sponsoring TLP.

podling.name: Tuscany
podling.description: Service Component Architecture implementation

podling.name: Twill
podling.description: Twill is an abstraction over Apache Hadoop YARN that reduces the complexity of developing distributed applications, allowing developers to focus more on their business logic

podling.name: UIMA
podling.description: Framework for analysing unstructured data.

podling.name: Unomi
podling.description: Unomi is a reference implementation of the OASIS Context Server specification currently being worked on by the OASIS Context Server Technical Committee. It provides a high-performance user profile and event tracking server.

podling.name: Usergrid
podling.description: Usergrid is Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) composed of an integrated database (Cassandra), application layer and client tier with SDKs for developers.

podling.name: VCL
podling.description: Virtual Computing Lab. Framework for creating, dispensing and running virtual images.

podling.name: VXQuery
podling.description: A standards compliant XML Query processor.

podling.name: WADI
podling.description: a robust hetorgeneous clustering engine used to cluster geronimo, tomcat, jetty and other containers eventually.
podling.resolution: Proposal withdrawn by creator; project continues at Codehaus.

podling.name: Wave
podling.description: A wave is a hosted, live, concurrent data structure for rich communication. It can be used like email, chat, or a document.

podling.name: WebWork 2
podling.description: A Java web-application development framework

podling.name: Weex
podling.description: Weex is a framework for building Mobile cross-platform high performance UI.

podling.name: Whirr
podling.description: Whirr provides code for running a variety of software services on cloud infrastructure.

podling.name: Wicket
podling.description: A web application framework that focusses on bringing plain object oriented Java programming to the web tier

podling.name: Wink
podling.description: Apache Wink is a project that enables development and consumption of REST style web services. The core server runtime is based on the JAX-RS (JSR 311) standard. The project also introduces a client runtime which can leverage certain components of the server-side runtime. Apache Wink will deliver component technology that can be easily integrated into a variety of environments.

podling.name: Woden
podling.description: Implementation of WSDL 2.0

podling.name: Wookie
podling.description: a W3C widget engine with Google Wave and Open Social Extensions.

podling.name: WSRP4J
podling.description: Implementation of OASIS Web Services for Remote Portlets (WSRP)

podling.name: XAP
podling.description: Declarative framework for building Ajax-powered web apps

podling.name: XMLBeans
podling.description: XML-Java binding tool with 100% support for XML Schema and full Infoset fidelity

podling.name: XMLBeans/C++
podling.description: C++ equivalent of Apache XMLBeans.

podling.name: Yoko
podling.description: A CORBA Server.

podling.name: Zeppelin
podling.description: A collaborative data analytics and visualization tool for distributed, general-purpose data processing systems such as Apache Spark, Apache Flink, etc.

podling.name: Zeta Components
podling.description: Zeta Components is a high-quality library of loosely-coupled PHP components.
